card_text: 2 monsters with different names$NIf a monster is Special Summoned to a zone this card points to: You can apply the following effects, in sequence, based on the card types of the monster(s) this card points to.$N●Ritual: Draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards.$N●Fusion: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your GY.$N●Synchro: All monsters you control gain 700 ATK.$N●Xyz: All monsters your opponent controls lose 700 ATK.$NYou can only use this effect of "Cross-Sheep" once per turn.
